original_title: Gorillaz: Phase One - Celebrity Take Down
overview: Celebrity Takedown is a compilation DVD by Gorillaz, released in November 2002. The DVD compiles the videos and animatics related to the release of the band's first album, Gorillaz, as well as the related singles.
tagline: An ego is a dangerous thing to feedâ€¦
title: Gorillaz: Phase One - Celebrity Take Down
